IN EXERCofI thSe Epo wers contained in regulation 3 of the Control
of Goods (Import and Export) (Agriculture) Regulations, the
following Order is hereby made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Control of Goods (Import Title
and Export) (Agriculture) (Prohibition of Export) Order, 2012.
2. The export of the commodities and goods listed in the Prohibition
Schedule is banned from the date of publication of this Order. ofe xpoofr t
